description:
While looking for a distro, you may see confusing terms like Fork, Flavour or Remix. This article decodes these terms to help you pick the distro that’s right for you.

The post What are Distro Forks, Flavors & Clones? Explaining Confusing Linux Terms appeared first on Linux Today.
title: What are Distro Forks, Flavors & Clones? Explaining Confusing Linux Terms
